text.__SUMMARY__: Lithocarpus kostermansii is a species of plant in the Fagaceae family. It is a tree endemic to Java in Indonesia. It is an endangered species threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Lithocarpus kostermansii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31996A9668899. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31996A9668899.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
